# ActionIcon

#### Introduced in version 1.3

| Property | Type | Required | Description | Version |
| -------- | ---- | -------- | ----------- | ------- |
| **url** | `uri` | Yes | The URL to the image. Supports data URI. | 1.3 |
| **tintable** | `boolean` | No | If `true`, the icon will be automatically themed to whatever color the host uses for action icons. Essentially, all non-transparent pixels in the image will be set to whatever color the host chooses. | 1.3 |
<!-- END AUTO-GENERATED -->

## Rendering
